Function re_sdk::external::re_types_core::external::arrow::compute::sum

pub fn sum<T>(
    array: &PrimitiveArray<T>,
) -> Option<<T as ArrowPrimitiveType>::Native>
where
    T: ArrowNumericType,
    <T as ArrowPrimitiveType>::Native: ArrowNativeTypeOp,
Expand description

Returns the sum of values in the primitive array.

Returns None if the array is empty or only contains null values.

This doesnâ€™t detect overflow in release mode by default. Once overflowing, the result will wrap around. For an overflow-checking variant, use sum_checked instead.
